title: I need more staff
creator_credit: Donald Crombie, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: A management game which highlights pressures at the middle management level including competing staff claims and personality relationships. The film is intended to assist group analysis and discussion of management problems relating or organisational control and co-ordination, and for use in the training of middle and senior management groups. Cast includes Don Philps, Stanley Walsh, Bruce Myles, Ronald Morse, John Orcsik.
